metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010006 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Evince 3.26.0 is affected by buffer overflow. The impact is: DOS / Possible code execution. The component is: backend/tiff/tiff-document.c. The attack vector is: Victim must open a crafted PDF file. The issue occurs because of an incorrect integer overflow protection mechanism in tiff_document_render and tiff_document_get_thumbnail.

criterions.comment: atril package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
